item.title: 拉里-埃里森的帆船联赛巴西扩军队由穆巴达拉拥有
item.description: 阿布扎比主权财富基金旗下的资产管理公司穆巴达拉资本（Mubadala Capital）收购了国际帆船比赛 SailGP 的一支扩充队伍。【原文：Mubadala Capital, an asset management firm owned by Abu Dhabi’s sovereign wealth fund, has acquired an expansion team in the international sailing competition SailGP.】

item.title: 秘鲁交易商 "感受兴奋"，纪念册股票暴涨 400
item.description: 秘鲁新建的 Chancay 港口尚未产生任何收入。它甚至还没有开始运行。然而，该项目少数股东的股票自不到一个月前上市以来，已经飙升了 400%。【原文：The new Chancay port in Peru hasn’t generated any revenue. It isn’t even up and running. Yet shares of a minority owner in the project have rocketed 400% since debuting less than a month ago.】

item.title: BBVA 间谍案结束前西班牙银行不会采取行动
item.description: 西班牙银行（Bank of Spain）的一位高级官员说，毕尔巴鄂维斯卡亚阿根廷银行（Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA）卷入的间谍案不会促使监管机构采取任何行动，直到对此事做出最终裁决。【原文：A spying case involving Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA won’t prompt any action from its regulator until after a final ruling in the matter, a top Bank of Spain official said.】

item.title: 南非斯帕公司计划收购以扩大市场份额
item.description: Spar Group Ltd. 正计划收购规模较小的零售商，以帮助这家南非收入第二大的杂货商在食品领域以外进行扩张，并在经济困难的情况下赢得市场份额。【原文：Spar Group Ltd. is planning to acquire smaller retailers to help South Africa’s second-largest grocer by revenue expand beyond the food segment and win market share in a struggling economy.】

item.title: 苹果公司的人工智能反弹使估值面临超越现实的风险
item.description: 苹果公司破纪录的涨势引发了人们对其人工智能战略是否证明其股票估值合理的质疑。【原文：Apple Inc.’s record-breaking rally has invited skepticism as to whether its artificial intelligence strategy justifies the stock’s valuation.】

item.title: 天气担忧导致巴西雷亚尔疲软，糖和咖啡受到冲击
item.description: 食糖和咖啡期货出现波动，原因是交易商在全球最大的食糖和咖啡出口国巴西的天气担忧与疲软的雷亚尔之间进行权衡。【原文：Sugar and coffee futures fluctuated as traders balance weather concerns in Brazil, the world’s largest exporter of the two commodities, against a weaker real.】

item.title: 津巴布韦向 Old Mutual 提出出售 2020 年以来被冻结股票的要约
item.description: Old Mutual 有限公司正在研究一项建议，即给予津巴布韦股票持有者出售选择权，允许他们为已停牌四年的股票获得赔偿。【原文：Old Mutual Ltd. is studying a proposal to give holders of its Zimbabwean stock an option to sell, allowing them to get paid out for shares that have been suspended for four years.】

item.title: 印度外汇储备从创纪录水平回落，印度央行支持卢比
item.description: 印度的外汇储备在上周创下历史新高后出现下降，原因是中央银行抛售美元以缓解卢比的跌势。【原文：India’s foreign exchange reserves fell after touching a record high in the previous week as the central bank sold dollars to cushion the rupee’s drop.】

item.title: 美国的核推进并不能保证核复兴
item.description:
南方公司的 Vogtle 反应堆超预算、延期，使得公用事业公司对承接另一个大型项目持谨慎态度。【原文：

Southern’s over-budget, delayed Vogtle reactors have made utilities wary of taking on another big project.

】

item.title: 挪威要求委员会考虑核电方案
item.description: 挪威政府任命了一个由前财政部长领导的小组，负责权衡挪威是否应该发展核能。【原文：Norway’s government appointed a panel lead by a former finance minister to weigh whether the nation should develop nuclear power.】

item.title: 法国左翼联盟称首批措施将耗资 250 亿欧元
item.description: 法国左派联盟公布了应对国家财政挑战的计划，将大幅增加公共开支，并废除埃马纽埃尔-马克龙的几项亲商改革措施。【原文：France’s leftist alliance unveiled plans to address the country’s fiscal challenges with a vast increase in public spending and to abolish several of Emmanuel Macron’s pro-business reforms.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。欧洲市场正在消化显示商业活动弱于预期的数据，而美国市场正在为所谓的三重巫术到期日做准备。与此同时，加拿大政府正准备对中国电动汽车征收新的关税。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. European markets are digesting data which showed weaker-than-expected business activity, while US markets are gearing up for the so-called triple witching expiration day. Meanwhile, in Canada, the government is preparing to slap new tariffs on Chinese EVs. Here’s what traders are talking about. — Morwenna Coniam】

item.title: 彭博社法国民意调查：勒庞极右翼势力步步高升
item.description: 据彭博社的民意调查显示，距离法国第一轮临时立法选举仅有九天时间，玛丽娜-勒庞领导的极右翼国民阵线的领先优势略有扩大。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s far-right National Rally has increased its lead slightly just nine days away from the first round of France’s snap legislative election, according to Bloomberg’s poll of polls.】

item.title: 被英国制裁的俄罗斯油轮齐聚波罗的海
item.description: 最近受到英国制裁的三艘原油油轮正在波罗的海集结，其中两艘将参与普里莫尔斯克港和乌斯季卢加港的装载计划。【原文：Three crude oil tankers recently sanctioned by the UK are gathering in the Baltic Sea, where two of them feature in loading programs for the ports of Primorsk and Ust-Luga.】

item.title: 肯尼亚准备迎接更多 Z 世代反税游行，造成一人死亡
item.description: 肯尼亚警方镇压了抗议增税提案的示威活动，造成一人死亡，数十人受伤。【原文：One person was killed and dozens more injured in a police crackdown on Kenyan protests against proposed tax hikes as the country braces for more marches next week when lawmakers take a final vote on the controversial levies.】

item.title: 菲律宾计划公布南海任务时间表
item.description: 菲律宾海事委员会将建议小费迪南德-马科斯总统提前公布在有争议的南海执行例行任务的时间表。【原文：A Philippine maritime council will recommend to President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. that the schedule of routine missions in the disputed South China Sea be announced ahead of time.】

item.title: 八达通将向政府偿还 30 亿英镑的灯泡收购款
item.description: 英国政府将获得章鱼能源有限公司偿还的 30 亿英镑（38 亿美元），此前政府曾介入帮助该公司收购在能源危机中失败的 Bulb 能源有限公司。【原文：The UK government will be repaid £3 billion ($3.8 billion) by Octopus Energy Ltd. after stepping in to help the company in its takeover of Bulb Energy Ltd, which failed during the energy crisis.】

item.title: 大亨们准备让出 Pick n Pay 投票权以吸引投资者
item.description: 雷蒙德-阿克曼（Raymond Ackerman）的家族放弃了他们在 Pick n Pay Stores Ltd. 公司的部分投票权，以帮助这家陷入困境的南非零售商吸引投资者。【原文：Raymond Ackerman’s family is giving up some of their voting power in Pick n Pay Stores Ltd. to help the struggling South African retailer woo investors.】

item.title: 台湾金融监管机构誓言放宽规则促进经济增长
item.description: 台湾市场监督管理局新任局长表示，在科技引领的投资热潮中，台湾计划放宽规则，让金融业在岛内经济产出中占据更大比重。【原文：Taiwan plans to ease rules to allow the finance industry to become a bigger part of the island’s economic output amid a tech-led boom in investments, according to the new head of its market watchdog.】

item.title: Segantii 退还三分之一基金资产并裁员数十人
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Segantii Capital Management Ltd. 已将其管理的 47 亿美元资产中的约三分之一返还给了投资者。【原文：Segantii Capital Management Ltd. has returned about a third of its $4.7 billion in assets under management to investors, according to people familiar with the matter, a month after the Asia hedge fund giant said it would wind down following an insider dealing charge.】

item.title: 爱沙尼亚阻止了将打击 Airbnb 和博尔特的欧盟税收新规
item.description: 爱沙尼亚正在阻止增值税改革，这项改革将对包括 Bolt Technology OU 和 Airbnb Inc.【原文：Estonia is blocking a reform of VAT which would impose new liabilities on digital platforms including short-term accommodation and passenger transport companies such as Bolt Technology OU and Airbnb Inc.】

item.title: 竞争激烈，日产汽车将关闭在中国常州的工厂
item.description: 日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co.）表示，由于全球最大汽车市场销量下滑，该公司将停止在中国一家工厂的生产。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. said it will cease production at a plant in China amid slumping sales in the world’s biggest automotive market.】

item.title: 欧洲数据疲软加剧降息押注，全球债券跳涨
item.description: 欧洲各地的商业活动意外受挫，促使交易商加大了对货币宽松政策的押注，债券随之飙升。【原文：Bonds surged after business activity across Europe encountered an unexpected setback, prompting traders to amp up wagers on monetary easing.】

item.title: 瑞士央行让市场猜不透
item.description: 欢迎收看《每周定额》（Weekly Fix），这份时事通讯的波动性仅略低于债券市场。我是跨资产记者凯蒂-格雷菲尔德（Katie Greifeld）。【原文：Welcome to the Weekly Fix, the newsletter that’s only slightly less volatile than the bond market. I’m cross-asset reporter Katie Greifeld.】

item.title: 英国采购经理人报告称通胀上升、增长放缓
item.description: 一项备受关注的行业调查显示，英国私营企业报告称，在大选前增长放缓，提价压力增大。【原文：Britain’s private sector companies reported slower growth and stronger pressures to increase prices in the lead up to the general election, a closely watched industry survey showed.】

item.title: 法国梅朗雄称左翼联盟将花费 2000 亿欧元
item.description: 法国左派联盟计划，如果在大选中获胜，将在未来五年为其优先事项投入2000亿欧元（约合2140亿美元）的公共开支，以扭转埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的劳动和养老金改革，促进经济增长。【原文：France’s leftist alliance plans public spending of €200 billion ($214 billion) for its priorities over the next five years if it wins the snap election as it seeks to reverse President Emmanuel Macron’s labor and pension reforms and boost growth.】

item.title: 据说 Generali 正在为土耳其和菲律宾业务寻找买家
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Assicurazioni Generali SpA 正在寻求出售其在土耳其和菲律宾的业务。【原文：Assicurazioni Generali SpA is seeking to sell its units in Turkey and the Philippines, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美银美林称：技术资金流入创纪录，所有道路都通向英伟达
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师表示，本周持续的人工智能热潮让英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：The ongoing artificial intelligence frenzy that briefly made Nvidia Corp. the world’s most valuable company this week also drove record inflows into tech funds, said Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 欧洲银行股涨势受到马克龙选举赌注的威胁
item.description: 在 2024 年的大部分时间里，欧洲银行股是该地区股市上涨的领头羊。随后，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）给这一切带来了麻烦。【原文：For much of 2024, European bank stocks were the leaders of the region’s equities rally. Then French President Emmanuel Macron threw a spanner in the works.】

item.title: Coreweave 首席运营官谈构建人工智能数据中心的业务
item.description:
增长的真正制约因素是什么？【原文：

What are the real constraints to growth?

】
